trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma matriz de controlo de <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: The `ADODCArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ADODC` control array.
trans-unit.target: O `ADODCArray` classe fornece um equivalente para a funcionalidade de tempo de execução de um Visual Basic 6.0 `ADODC` matriz de controlo.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Não fornece as funcionalidades de tempo de criação de uma matriz de controlo do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC"></xref> in an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC"> </xref> num <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: O `Click` eventos transmite um <xref:System.EventArgs>para o processador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte apenas indica que ocorreu um clique.

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de informações mais específicas de rato (botão, número de cliques, rotação roda ou localização), utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>o evento não será gerado se a, clique em é causado por ação diferente que o rato, por exemplo, premindo a tecla ENTER.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Um duplo clique é determinado pelas definições de rato do sistema de operativo do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode definir o tempo entre cliques de um botão do rato que devem ser considerados um duplo clique em vez de dois cliques.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: O `Click` evento é desencadeado sempre que um controlo é duplo clique.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver de processadores de eventos para o `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>eventos de um [controlo](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), a `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>eventos são gerados quando o controlo faz duplo clique e ambos os métodos são denominados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: Se um controlo faz duplo clique e que o controlo não suporta o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento, o `Click` evento poderá ser gerado duas vezes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo é introduzido.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o foco, utilizando o teclado (SEPARADOR, SHIFT + TAB e assim sucessivamente) ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Quando altera o foco, utilizando o rato ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: O `GiveFeedback` evento é desencadeado quando é iniciada uma operação de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, you can configure the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando o `GiveFeedback` eventos, pode configurar a origem de um evento de arrastar para modificar o aspecto do ponteiro do rato para comentários do utilizador visual durante uma operação de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: Ocorrem eventos chaves pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>o `KeyPress` o evento não é gerado pelo chaves noncharacter; no entanto, as chaves noncharacter elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>propriedade batimentos de tecla de exemplo no tempo de execução e para consumir ou modificar um subconjunto de batimentos de tecla comuns.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para processar eventos de teclado apenas ao nível do formulário e não ativar controlos para receber eventos de teclado, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade sob a forma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>método de processamento de eventos para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controlo deve reposicionar respectivos controlos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O `Layout` evento ocorre quando controlos subordinados são adicionados ou removidos, quando os limites das alterações de controlo e quando ocorrem outras alterações que podem afetar o esquema do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O evento de esquema pode ser suprimido, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de suspensão permite-lhe efetuar várias ações num controlo sem ter de efetuar um esquema para cada alteração.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se redimensionar e mover um controlo, cada operação iria gerar um `Layout` eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o foco de entrada deixa o controlo.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o foco, utilizando o teclado (SEPARADOR, SHIFT + TAB e assim sucessivamente) ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Quando altera o foco, utilizando o rato ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato assenta no controlo.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: Uma utilização típica do `MouseHover` é para apresentar uma sugestão de ferramenta quando o rato pausa sobre um controlo dentro de uma área especificado em redor do controlo ("Paire retângulo").

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A colocação em pausa necessária para este evento para ser gerado é especificada em milissegundos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O `MouseHover` evento é definido e detetado connection com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is providing Help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> está a fornecer ajuda para aplicações de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke Help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: Deve utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>classe para permitir aos utilizadores invocar ajuda no seu objeto acessível premindo a tecla F1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> gives you complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e largar e permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastar e largar deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O `QueryContinueDrag` o evento é gerado quando existe uma alteração no estado de botão de teclado ou rato durante uma operação de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O `QueryContinueDrag` eventos permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastar e largar deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo redimensionado, pode converter a `sender` parâmetro do <xref:System.EventArgs>dados para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade (ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Propriedades individualmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: Para processar esquemas personalizados, utilize o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout>eventos em vez do `Resize` eventos.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout>o evento é gerado em resposta a um `Resize` eventos, mas também em resposta a outras alterações que afetam o esquema do controlo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should be called only when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
